verses.verse: And Jehovah<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872> in the wilderness<WH4057> of Sinai<WH5514>, in the first<WH7223> month<WH2320> of the second<WH8145> year<WH8141> after they were come out<WH3318> of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>, saying<WH559>,
Moreover let the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> keep<WH6213> the passover<WH6453> in its appointed season<WH4150>.

In the fourteenth<WH702> day<WH3117> of this month<WH2320>, at even<WH6153>, ye shall keep<WH6213> it in its appointed season<WH4150>: according to all the statutes<WH2708> of it<WH4941>, and according to all the ordinances thereof<WH6213>, shall ye keep it.
And Moses<WH4872> spake<WH1696> unto the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, that they should keep<WH6213> the passover<WH6453>.

And they kept<WH6213> the passover<WH6453> in the first<WH7223> month<WH2320>, on the fourteenth<WH702> day<WH3117> of the month<WH6153>, at even, in the wilderness<WH4057> of Sinai<WH5514>: according to all that Jehovah<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses<WH4872>, so did<WH6213> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>.

And there were certain men<WH582>, who were unclean<WH2931> by reason of the dead body<WH5315> of a man<WH120>, so that they could<WH3201> not keep<WH6213> the passover<WH6453> on that day<WH3117>: and they came<WH7126> before<WH6440> Moses<WH4872> and before<WH6440> Aaron<WH175> on that day<WH3117>:

and those<WH1992> men<WH582> said<WH559> unto him<WH2931>, We are unclean by reason of the dead body<WH5315> of a man<WH120>: wherefore are we kept back<WH1639>, that we may not offer<WH7126> the oblation<WH7133> of Jehovah<WH3068> in its appointed season<WH4150> among<WH8432> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>?
And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> unto them<WH5975>, Stay ye<WH8085>, that I may hear what Jehovah<WH3068> will command concerning you<WH6680>.
And Jehovah<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872>, saying<WH559>,

Speak <WH1696> unto the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, saying<WH559>, If any<WH376> man<WH376> of you or of your generations<WH1755> shall be unclean<WH2931> by reason of a dead body<WH5315>, or be on a journey<WH1870> afar off<WH7350>, yet he shall keep<WH6213> the passover<WH6453> unto Jehovah<WH3068>.
In the second<WH8145> month<WH2320> on the fourteenth<WH702> day<WH3117> at even<WH6153> they shall keep<WH6213> it<WH398>; they shall eat it with unleavened bread<WH4682> and bitter herbs<WH4844>:
they shall leave<WH7604> none of it unto the morning<WH1242>, nor break<WH7665> a bone<WH6106> thereof<WH2708>: according to all the statute of the passover<WH6453> they shall keep it<WH6213>.

But the man<WH376> that is clean<WH2889>, and is not on a journey<WH1870>, and forbeareth<WH2308> to keep<WH6213> the passover<WH6453>, that soul<WH5315> shall be cut off<WH3772> from his people<WH5971>; because he offered<WH7126> not the oblation<WH7133> of Jehovah<WH3068> in its appointed season<WH4150>, that man<WH376> shall bear<WH5375> his sin<WH2399>.

And if a stranger<WH1616> shall sojourn<WH1481> among you<WH6213>, and will keep the passover<WH6453> unto Jehovah<WH3068>; according to the statute<WH2708> of the passover<WH6453>, and according to the ordinance<WH4941> thereof<WH6213>, so shall he do: ye shall have one<WH259> statute<WH2708>, both for the sojourner<WH1616>, and for him that is born<WH249> in the land<WH776>.

And on the day<WH3117> that the tabernacle<WH4908> was reared up<WH6965> the cloud<WH6051> covered<WH3680> the tabernacle<WH4908>, even the tent<WH168> of the testimony<WH5715>: and at even<WH6153> it was upon the tabernacle<WH4908> as it were the appearance<WH4758> of fire<WH784>, until morning<WH1242>.
So it was alway<WH8548>: the cloud<WH6051> covered<WH3680> it<WH4758>, and the appearance of fire<WH784> by night<WH3915>.

And whenever<WH6310> the cloud<WH6051> was taken up<WH5927> from over the Tent<WH168>, then after<WH310> that the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> journeyed<WH5265>: and in the place<WH4725> where the cloud<WH6051> abode<WH7931>, there the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> encamped<WH2583>.

At the commandment<WH6310> of Jehovah<WH3068> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> journeyed<WH5265>, and at the commandment<WH6310> of Jehovah<WH3068> they encamped<WH2583>: as long as<WH3117> the cloud<WH6051> abode<WH7931> upon the tabernacle<WH4908> they remained encamped<WH2583>.

And when the cloud<WH6051> tarried<WH748> upon the tabernacle<WH4908> many<WH7227> days<WH3117>, then the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> kept<WH8104> the charge<WH4931> of Jehovah<WH3068>, and journeyed not<WH5265>.

And sometimes<WH3426> the cloud<WH6051> was a few<WH4557> days<WH3117> upon the tabernacle<WH4908>; then according to the commandment<WH6310> of Jehovah<WH3068> they remained encamped<WH2583>, and according to the commandment<WH6310> of Jehovah<WH3068> they journeyed<WH5265>.

And sometimes<WH3426> the cloud<WH6051> was from evening<WH6153> until morning<WH1242>; and when the cloud<WH6051> was taken up<WH5927> in the morning<WH1242>, they journeyed<WH5265>: or if it continued by day<WH3119> and by night<WH3915>, when the cloud<WH6051> was taken up<WH5927>, they journeyed<WH5265>.

Whether it were two days<WH3117>, or a month<WH2320>, or a year<WH3117>, that the cloud<WH6051> tarried<WH748> upon the tabernacle<WH4908>, abiding<WH7931> thereon<WH1121>, the children of Israel<WH3478> remained encamped<WH2583>, and journeyed<WH5265> not<WH5927>; but when it was taken up, they journeyed<WH5265>.

At the commandment<WH6310> of Jehovah<WH3068> they encamped<WH2583>, and at the commandment<WH6310> of Jehovah<WH3068> they journeyed<WH5265>: they kept<WH8104> the charge<WH4931> of Jehovah<WH3068>, at the commandment<WH6310> of Jehovah<WH3068> by<WH3027> Moses<WH4872>.
